definition: hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
like a clay Bodhisattva fording a river, can't guarantee his own safety/unable to save oneself, let alone others
pinyin: ni2 pu2 sa4 guo4 jiang1 , zi4 shen1 nan2 bao3

sentences.english: then shall ye make me endanger my head to the king.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，你們就使我的頭在王那裏難保。

sentences.english: Alexander II is very clear, if not abandoned the small profits, then the Italian there is no guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 亞歷山大二世很清楚，若不棄小利，則大利難保。

sentences.english: He is now like a clay Buddha fording the river, hardly able to save himself.
sentences.chinese: 他現在也是泥菩薩過河自身難保了。

sentences.english: So that was the end of the shrine.
sentences.chinese: 這就是那座神龕的結局，他自身都難保，如何守護人？

sentences.english: That remark might arouse snickers from people around the league.
sentences.chinese: 這番話難保不會招致聯盟其他成員的竊笑。

sentences.english: Beauty is as summer fruits, which are easy to corrupt, and cannot last;
sentences.chinese: 美猶如盛夏的水果，是容易腐爛而難保持的。

sentences.english: It's hard for beginners to keep their balance on in-line skates.
sentences.chinese: 初學者穿着直排輪鞋很難保持平衡。

sentences.english: They find it difficult to keep good staff because of the brain drain.
sentences.chinese: 由於人才外流，他們很難保住一班齊備的人馬了。

sentences.english: He could not keep himself safe like mud bodhisattva pass river.
sentences.chinese: 他本人是泥菩薩過河，自身難保。

sentences.english: Okay, so I'm endangering myself so that this evil principle can die?
sentences.chinese: 我自身難保了，這條爛規定可以廢止嗎？

sentences.english: The stronger the suffering, the harder it is to keep self-remembering on track.
sentences.chinese: 痛苦越強，就越難保持記得自己。

sentences.english: whereas governments would let some banks fail.
This results in test cases being difficult to keep up-to-date.
sentences.chinese: 這導致測試用例很難保持最新。

sentences.english: Online donors also tend to be tougher to retain.
sentences.chinese: 網絡捐款者也趨向於更難保留。

sentences.english: Other works of art that have been revered for generations have eventually gone out of fashion.
sentences.chinese: 有些曾被崇拜了幾代的藝術品卻最終難保風光依舊。

sentences.english: Beauty is as summer fruits, which are easy to corrupt, and cannot last.
sentences.chinese: 美有如盛夏的水果，而容易腐爛而難保持的。
